blog_bit: Hey, hey, hey listeners! Another month of tech has whizzed us by but here's a few stuff that's caught our radar at Stuff HQ.
blog_more:
Our topics include: A No Man's Sky parody snappily entitled No Mario’s Sky Pokémon GO, anyone still playing that? Facebook gets carried away HP printers PornHub gets banned in Russia Internauts day isn't a thing, but we knew that The Oculus Rift goes into the shops ESP32 is coming and some Apple news

Local events: Yorkshire Games Festival at the National Media Museum - 9th to 13th November Leeds Hack at Futurelabs - 8th to 9th October

⇡
  • What is IT STUFF? Your monthly tech comedy broadcast is presented by David, shi, Kriss & Dick. Listen live on BCB Radio (106.6 FM) every 4 weeks on Thursday, 6:00pm - 6:30pm. Repeated the next day on Friday at 1:30pm - 2:00pm.
  • Info Subscribe (RSS) Episodes Archive About
